item.title: [khc] Mind Stone
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add {C}.

{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Mind Stone: Draw a card.

item.title: [khc] Meteor Golem
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Golem

When Meteor Golem enters the battlefield, destroy target nonland permanent an opponent controls.

item.title: [khc] Sol Ring
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add {C}{C}.

item.title: [khc] Swiftfoot Boots
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature has hexproof and haste.

Equip {1}

item.title: [khc] Azorius Guildgate
item.description:
Land — Gate

Azorius Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {W} or {U}.

item.title: [khc] Azorius Chancery
item.description:
Land

Azorius Chancery enters the battlefield tapped.

When Azorius Chancery enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.

{T}: Add {W}{U}.

item.title: [khc] Cryptic Caves
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Cryptic Caves: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if you control five or more lands.

item.title: [khc] Command Tower
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

item.title: [khc] Golgari Guildgate
item.description:
Land — Gate

Golgari Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {B} or {G}.

item.title: [khc] Foul Orchard
item.description:
Land

Foul Orchard enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {B} or {G}.

item.title: [khc] Cosmic Intervention
item.description:
Instant

If a permanent you control would be put into a graveyard from the battlefield this turn, exile it instead. Return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

Foretell {1}{W} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

item.title: [khc] Hero of Bretagard
item.description:
Creature — Human Warrior

Whenever you exile one or more cards from your hand and/or permanents from the battlefield, put that many +1/+1 counters on Hero of Bretagard.

As long as Hero of Bretagard has five or more counters on it, it has flying and is an Angel in addition to its other types.

As long as Hero of Bretagard has ten or more counters on it, it has indestructible and is a God in addition to its other types.

item.title: [khc] Stoic Farmer
item.description:
Creature — Dwarf Pesant

When Stoic Farmer enters the battlefield, search your library for a basic Plains card and reveal it. If an opponent controls more lands than you, put it onto the battlefield tapped. Otherwise, put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

Foretell {1}{W} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

item.title: [khc] Sage of the Beyond
item.description:
Creature — Spirit Giant

Flying

Spells you cast from anywhere other than your hand cost {2} less to cast.

Foretell {4}{U} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

item.title: [khc] Spectral Deluge
item.description:
Sorcery

Return each creature your opponents control with toughness X or less to its owner's hand, where X is the number of Islands you control.

Foretell {1}{U}{U} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

item.title: [khc] Tales of the Ancestors
item.description:
Sorcery

Each player with fewer cards in hand than the player with the most cards in hand draws cards equal to the difference.

Foretell {1}{U} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

item.title: [khc] Ethereal Valkyrie
item.description:
Creature — Spirit Angel

Flying

Whenever Ethereal Valkyrie enters the battlefield or attacks, draw a card, then exile a card from your hand face down. It becomes foretold. Its foretell cost is its mana cost reduced by {2}. (On a later turn, you may cast it for its foretell cost, even if this creature has left the battlefield.)

item.title: [khc] Pact of the Serpent
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose a creature type. Target player draws X cards and loses X life, where X is the number of creature they control of the chosen type.

item.title: [khc] Ruthless Winnower
item.description:
Creature — Elf Rogue

At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices a non-Elf creature.

item.title: [khc] Serpent's Soul-Jar
item.description:
Artifact

Whenever an Elf you control dies, exile it.

{T}, Pay 2 life: Until end of turn, you may cast a creature spell from among cards exiled with Serpent's Soul-Jar.

item.title: [khc] Bounty of Skemfar
item.description:
Sorcery

Reveal the top six cards of your library. You may put a land card from among them onto the battlefield tapped and an Elf card from among them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

item.title: [khc] Crown of Skemfar
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each Elf you control and has reach.

{2}{G}: Return Bounty of Skemfar from your graveyard to your hand.

item.title: [khc] Elderfang Venom
item.description:
Enchantment

Attacking Elves you control have deathtouch.

Whenever an Elf you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

item.title: [khm] Fynn, the Fangbearer
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Warrior

Deathtouch

Whenever a creature you control with deathtouch deals combat damage to a player, that player gets two poison counters. (A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)

https://www.dicebreaker.com/amp/games/magic-the-gathering-game/news/mtg-kaldheim-reveal-fynn-fangbearer

item.title: [khm] Arni Brokenbrow
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Berserker

Haste

Boast — {1}: You may change Arni Brokenbrow's base power to 1 plus the greatest power among other creatures you control until end of turn. (Activate this ability only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)

https://twitter.com/crendor/status/1350258533019897858

item.title: [khm] Moritte of the Frost
item.description:
Legendary Snow Creature — Shapeshifter

Changeling (This card is every creature type.)

You may have Moritte of the Frost enter the battlefield as a copy of a permanent you control, except it's legendary and snow in addition to its other types and, if it's a creature, it enters with two additional +1/+1 counters on it and has changeling.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cnkDuLEeVyE

item.title: [khm] Maja, Bretagard Protector
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Warrior

Other creatures you control get +1/+1.

Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, create a 1/1 white Human Warrior creature token.

https://twitter.com/Semulin/status/1350191220396617730

item.title: [khm] Svella, Ice Shaper
item.description:
Legendary Snow Creature — Troll Warrior

{3}, {T}: Create a colorless snow artifact token named Icy Manalith with "{T}: Add one mana of any color."

{6}{R}{G}, {T}: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may cast a spell from among them without paying its mana cost. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

https://twitter.com/egoraptor/status/1350557412529377280

item.title: [khm] Runeforge Champion
item.description:
Creature — Dwarf Warrior

When Runeforge Champion enters the battlefield, you may search your library and/or graveyard for a Rune card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle it.

You may pay {1} rather than pay the mana cost for Rune spells you cast.

https://twitter.com/MTGatTCGplayer/status/1351545501825564672

item.title: [khm] Icebreaker Kraken
item.description:
Snow Creature — Kraken

This spell costs {1} less to cast for each snow land you control.

When Icebreaker Kraken enters the battlefield, artifacts and creatures target opponent controls don't untap during that player's next untap step.

Return three snow lands you control to their owner's hand: Return Icebreaker Kraken to its owner's hand.

https://twitter.com/SeattleKraken/status/1351589880665579521

item.title: [khm] Graven Lore
item.description:
Snow Instant

Scry X, where is the amount of {S} spent to cast this spell, then draw three cards. ({S} is mana from a snow source.)

https://twitter.com/egoraptor/status/1350565518684524548

item.title: [khm] Crippling Fear
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose a creature type. Creatures that aren't of the chosen type get -3/-3 until end of turn.

https://cafe.naver.com/mtgkr/583

item.title: [khm] Blessing of Frost
item.description:
Snow Sorcery

Distribute X +1/+1 counters among any number of creatures you control, where X is the amount of {S} spent to cast this spell. Then draw a card for each creature you control with power 4 or greater. ({S} is mana from a snow source.)

https://www.facebook.com/orkenspaltertv/photos/pcb.3638652079561346/3638649906228230/

item.title: [khm] Tyrite Sanctum
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{2}, {T}: Target legendary creature becomes a God in addition to its other types. Put a +1/+1 counter on it.

{4}, {T}, Sacrifice Tyrite Sanctum: Put an indestructible counter on target God.

item.title: [khm] Cosmos Elixir
item.description:
Artifact

At the beginning of your end step, draw a card if your life total is greater than your starting life total. Otherwise, you gain 2 life.

item.title: [khm] The World Tree
item.description:
Land

The World Tree enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {G}.

As long as you control six or more lands, lands you control have "{T}: Add one mana of any color."

{W}{W}{U}{U}{B}{B}{R}{R}{G}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice The World Tree: Search your library for any number of God cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

https://twitter.com/KingCash_7191/status/1347641967031820290

item.title: [khm] Dream Devourer
item.description:
Creature — Demon Cleric

Each nonland card in your hand without foretell has foretell. Its foretell cost is equal to its mana cost reduced by {2}. (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile it from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

Whenever you foretell a card, Dream Devourer gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
